website_summaries.verdict: This tote bag is an impressive smaller option to transparently carry all must-haves.
pros: Strap makes it comfortable to carry on shoulder and it’s roomy enough to fit a wealth of items
Has top zipper to keep items safe inside bag
Great for transporting spillable items since this bag is easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Great size and durable
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag to stick on my backseat that held basic essentials like an umbrella, gloves, travel wipes, and some things to keep me sane while waiting in a dr/dentist office-magazine, snack. I chose a clear bag because we've had a lot of break ins lately where women and school kids left purses and backpacks on the backseat. I wanted mine to give a clear message, no pun intended, that nothing in it was worth busting a window or lock for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary_

customer_reviews.title: Good size bag and well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife since we are attending sporting events that require "clear" bags in order to enter. The bag isn't a decent size, basically big enough to put a toaster in it. She was able to carry a towel, money purse, bottles of water, snacks and a couple of other items. The bag itself is sturdy and well constructed with a zipper to close it up and keep items from coming out.
customer_reviews.author: TonyG

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Ordering 3 more!
customer_reviews.text: I work in retail and for security reasons, we have to use a clear plastic bag in place of a purse. The silly little "envelopes" we are given are worthless. So I searched on line and found this great buy. This tote is fantastic! It can hold all of my personal items and then some. It is well made for a plastic carrier plus I love the zipper. So pleased that I am ordering 3 more as gifts for friends at work.
customer_reviews.author: LittleMurph

customer_reviews.title: Used for job at a prison
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I worked at a prison and it was perfect for my needs. The bag is roomy and durable, and fit my lunch, wallet, umbrella, water bottle, and other items perfectly. The strap is long enough to carry over your shoulder, or you could just carry it by hand. The zipper is sturdy, as well. It's definitely not a designer bag, but for someone who works in a setting that requires clear bags this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: carly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she loves it. She needed a clear bag to carry work files in. This bag perfectly accommodates papers and folders that are 8 1/2 x 11 inches and has a nice, professional look.
customer_reviews.author: M. Renee

customer_reviews.title: used it for work due to security issues.. ...
customer_reviews.text: used it for work due to security issues....after several months of everyday use it began to tear at the plastic. zipper still worked but had to eventually throw away....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the quality and the size for what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality and the size for what I needed it for I often feel I have quite a nest of things to take places with me but I don't want to carry in my purse. So this usually stays in my car and I can quickly access what I need without digging around in a dark hole.
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: the bags are nice looking but what I didn't like the fact that they came folded up in a small package and I needed these bags to be just as smooth because im adding images on them and once plastic gets wrinkled its hard to get them out but we will see how it goes
customer_reviews.author: ANGIE R

customer_reviews.title: These bags are awesome! I was unaware of stadiums requiring see-through bags--I ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome! I was unaware of stadiums requiring see-through bags--I had ordered these because I put a lot of items on hooks to prevent the dog from getting into them (lack of closets and cupboards). The bags I was using are not transparent, so I often would lose things for weeks. The clear bags let me see what's inside. They zip at the top and have a generous shoulder drop. I've been able to grab a bag and go when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: HHS-OH

customer_reviews.title: Cut, but cheaply made...will fall apart!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this bag would be super cute and perfect for my days by the pool during my cruise. But I was wrong, the bag started to fall apart by the 3rd day...it’s a don’t buy for me!
customer_reviews.author: Wanjiru

customer_reviews.title: nice beach bag, could be larger
customer_reviews.text: it was definitely a convenient beach bag. I just wish it was bigger to hold our huge beach towels. it was strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Shaday Isehenrien

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable Enough For Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bag at first, good size and seemed durable. I started using it mid November. But now it’s January (2 months later) and I already need to replace it. The plastic on the sides are splitting. The bag was a waste of money. It’s just not very durable. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl is the new leather!
customer_reviews.text: Vinyl is the new leather! For the price & purpose, it’s worth it. I’m doing in-person elementary school filled with slobbery kids, and, oh, there’s this pandemic thing happening. Easy to clean & sterilize. Handle with care, I don’t see it having the longevity of leather. Nonetheless, all things operate smoothly: zipper, handle, seams.
customer_reviews.author: Lindie Sanford

customer_reviews.title: clear tote
customer_reviews.text: I liked this tote, looks nice & well constructed but the materials used are a lighter weight than I thought it would be. I have to use this every day to enter & exit my workplace so we will just have to see how long it lasts with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Large enough, seems durable and great price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. I will be using it for the college basketball tournaments coming the first part of March. Hopefully it’s not too large. Got caught up in a golf tournament that my clear backpack was too large. It is unfortunate that common sense has left this country. You can see through these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Gets me through my work security check quickly . The only reason I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because it is smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's cute and great for travels
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest little bag ever! I put all my hair products in there so in case of spills! It's cute and great for travels!
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I work retail and this is the best value for a great, sturdy bag. Zipper is great! No complaints! I even carry it on my off days. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Koi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This bag was for my mom. Its starting to rip already she don't put a lot of stuff in it its cheap so we won't order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a purse.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Can hold wallet, bottle of water and lunch as well as sundries. Sturdy and zipper works well. Good purse size.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: A decent size clear tote
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something clear to carry my crochet projects in. This is light and the perfect size for 3 skeins of yarn. It will just zip close if you put a 2 inch binder with the wide side up. I don't go to stadiums so I don't know if this is sufficient for that.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for concerts, football games, airports. Makes checking at the gate fast & easy.
customer_reviews.author: Pegrita

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a hole. No biggie, I sewed it shut. Then it tore open on another part. I threw it away after two weeks of moderate use. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: CatherineRenee

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size bag to tote all my stuff to work
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size bag to tote all my stuff to work. And it's better quality than I've seen with most clear bags. UPDATE: It eventually started falling apart, but it served its purpose while I had it. I ended up buying a smaller, more sturdy clear bag to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Metz

customer_reviews.title: Its ok, thin material
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, won't last too long, as the vinyl is thin. It was cheap, so I guess you get what you pay for.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Casino work
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to take to work.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased bags like this before and was satisfied with this one. I have to carry a clear bag where I work.

customer_reviews.title: Great for stadium use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to carry into a NASCAR race, and they easily fit everything we needed while complying with the track rules for bags.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag overall
customer_reviews.text: Good bag overall, but it feels a little cheaply made. I bought it for work so if you’re looking for that it’ll certainly do

customer_reviews.title: Cute little lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I use the bag for lunch. Its perfect and small enough to put into the fridge at work

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: With increased security in public events, this is a good purse to carry essentials to a sports game, musical concerts or even on short weekend travel.

customer_reviews.title: It’s great.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It just the right size for my stuff—-not to big or too small. I love the fact that is see through so it is easy to find what I need.

customer_reviews.title: Large reasonably priced security tote
customer_reviews.text: Not high fashion, but that wasn't expected. It accomplished the goal of getting me through security for a large graduation ceremony. It holds more than expected. The price was right, and it was delivered quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Super love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this !!!! It’s perfect for my stuff going to work.

customer_reviews.title: One time use

customer_reviews.title: Too small for books and folders
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag. Too small to hold notebook. Seams and zipper lightweight. I purchased with intent to use as a work book bag. Too small and flimsy. Will use it for a lunch bag.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Best part.
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to bring into football stadium and large enough for my jacket, wallet, and a couple bottled water. Best part ... security check is a breeze because they can look right thru to see what's inside.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, just depends on which size you need.

product_meta.title: Clear Shoulder Zipper Tote
product_meta.description:
Clear shoulder tote has a top gray zipper and a 600 denier colored fabric bottom with matching handles. Perfect size to carry all the things you need! Bag Dimensions: approx. 16”W x 12”H x 4”G




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :12.91 x 8.58 x 1.61 inches; 4.8 Ounces
 * Date First Available :May 30, 2014
 * ASIN :B00JSA8UW8

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #175,875 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #78309 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #61 inWomen's Top-Handle Handbags 
    *  #729 inWomen's Tote Handbags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars284 ratings Clear shoulder tote has a top gray zipper and a 600 denier colored fabric bottom with matching handles. Perfect size to carry all the things you need! Bag Dimensions: approx. 16”W x 12”H x 4”G
feature_bullets: DURABLE & STURDY – Ensign Peak’s Clear Shoulder Tote with ZIPPER Closure is a sturdy, durable bag that will hold up with repeated use. It is made of 3mm clear PVC with a 600D Poly Vinyl Bottom. As well as being durable, the clear vinyl makes it easy to find things. It is also waterproof which makes it perfect for wet towels and bathing suits. Also, the bag stands up when you set it down, making it easy to fill it up.

SHOULDER LENGTH HANDLES – The shoulder length handles make it easy to carry the bag. The handles are also stitched down the entire height of the bag for added durability. You can carry your items with confidence.
TOP ZIPPER – There is a full length zipper that helps keep your items secure and safe.

SECURITY - Pass through security checkpoints with ease with this see-through bag. Events, concerts, soccer, football, and baseball games are easier to attend and bring your stuff when you have a clear transparent tote bag.
DIMENSIONS & MATERIAL - 16”W x 12”H x 4”, 26" Handles. Durable 3mm clear PVC with 600D Poly bottom.
